meta.name: DC.title
meta.content: StratML Part 1 to Part 2 Conversion XForm

meta.name: DC.subject
meta.content: Strategic Plans, StratML Part 2, StratML, XForms, XSLTForms, Performance Plans, Performance Reports

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Strategic Plans, StratML, XForms, XSTForms, Performance Plans, Performance Reports

Stakeholder.Name: Carolina Virginia’s Minority Supplier Development Council (CVMSDC)

Role.Description: Development of the Aerospace, Technology and TDL (Transportation, Distribution, and Logistics) Sectors.

Stakeholder.Name: Department of Health and Environmental Control

Role.Description: Assistance with the Life Science Industry Sector

Stakeholder.Name: South Carolina Association of Community & Economic Development

Role.Description: Audit of Job Development Tax Credits and Administrative Collaboration

Stakeholder.Name: South Carolina Parks, Recreation and Tourism

Role.Description: Marketing the State with Palmetto Partners/Just Right

Vision.Description: The South Carolina Department of Public Safety’s vision is to ensure that this agency is setting the standard for public safety excellence as a cohesive team by making South Carolina a safer place to live, work, and visit through protection, education, and service. Embedded within SCDPS’ efforts and initiatives to serve the public are the agency’s core values: Integrity, Excellence, Accountability, and Leadership.

Mission.Description: As the largest law enforcement agency in South Carolina, it is the mission of the South Carolina Department of Public Safety to protect and serve the public with the highest standard of conduct and professionalism; to save lives through educating its citizens on highway safety and diligent enforcement of laws governing traffic, motor vehicles, and commercial carriers; and to ensure a safe, secure environment for the citizens of the state of South Carolina and its visitors.

Goal.Name: Capital Investment & Job Creation
Goal.Description: Attract capital investment and job creation throughout South Carolina

Objective.Name: Marketing Strategy
Objective.Description: Implement a targeted marketing strategy to promote new investment and job creation

TargetResult.Description: Meet or Exceed capital investment goal established by agency
Meet or Exceed jobs recruited goal established by agency
South Carolina's ranking of the most business-friendly state in the U.S.
South Carolina's ranking among the states in Foreign Direct Investment jobs as a percentage of total employment

Objective.Name: Rural Jobs
Objective.Description: Increase Emphasis on recruiting jobs to rural communities of SC

TargetResult.Description: Meet or Exceed goal established by agency for jobs recruited in rural areas of SC.
Meet or Exceed % of jobs recruited in rural areas of SC as compared to % of labor pool residing in rural counties.

Goal.Name: Small & Emerging Industries
Goal.Description: Build on the strengths of the state's existing, small, and emerging industries

Objective.Name: Strengths
Objective.Description: Build on the strengths of the state's existing industries

TargetResult.Description: Hold seminars with partners to increase existing businesses understanding of exporting and trade resources
South Carolina's ranking of states in exports per capita
Number of companies visited as a result of the agency Existing Industry Visitation Program
Calls addressed by agency concerning recycling industry inquiries

Objective.Name: Small Businesses
Objective.Description: Build on the strengths of the state's small businesses

TargetResult.Description: Calls addressed by agency concerning small business inquiries
Host existing industry events for local suppliers and service providers to connect them with opportunities with state OEM's/Tier 1's

Objective.Name: Innovative & Emerging Industries
Objective.Description: Build on the strengths of the state's innovative and emerging industries

TargetResult.Description: Year over year growth in Scribble Brand
Number of innovation ecosystem strategy, networking, and building events
Number of companies accepted into the 3Phase program

Goal.Name: Knowledge & Infrastructure
Goal.Description: Increase the knowledge and available infrastructure in South Carolina through workforce and community development

Objective.Name: Products
Objective.Description: Work with local leaders to develop economic development "product," such as speculative buildings, industrial sites and parks to ensure that communities have available properties for investors and job creators

TargetResult.Description: Add quality sites to revised building and sites database (LocateSC)
Add quality buildings to revised building and sites database (LocateSC)

Objective.Name: Infrastructure
Objective.Description: Improve infrastructure of South Carolina Lower-Moderate Income (LMI) communities by making a suitable living environment more widely available.

TargetResult.Description: Number of predominantly LMI communities that received CDBG funding for new or improved infrastructure, facilities or services
Number of predominantly LMI communities that received CDBG funding for community and regional planning and coordination initiatives
Number of predominantly LMI communities that received CDBG funding to preserve neighborhoods through revitalization, development or elimination of blight

Objective.Name: Training
Objective.Description: Provide timely, relevant, and up-to-date economic development training for local leadership and practitioners.

TargetResult.Description: Meet or exceed the goal established by agency for number of attendees participating in agency sponsored training opportunities
Economic development training provided by agency meeting the needs of attendees

Goal.Name: Workforce
Goal.Description: Serve as the connection for the business and education communities in order to prepare the workforce to meet industry demands

Objective.Name: Information, Resources & Services
Objective.Description: Facilitate the delivery of information, resources, and services to students and their parents, educators, employers in our local communities.

TargetResult.Description: Number of educators receiving information, resources, and services at sponsored events
Number of students receiving information, resources, and services at sponsored events
Number of high schools and technical colleges participating in the Renaissance Manufacturing Initiative during the current period
Number of existing industries participating in the Renaissance Manufacturing Initiative during the current period

Objective.Name: Applied Research
Objective.Description: Facilitate Applied Research by partnering SC institutes of Higher Education with Companies and Partners to collaborate and find solutions to real-time business conditions

TargetResult.Description: Numbers of Partners/Companies involved in grants funded in the current year with Applied Research Fund Dollars

Goal.Name: Agency Assets
Goal.Description: Manage agency assets to achieve agency goals and objectives

Objective.Name: Goals & Objectives
Objective.Description: Manage agency assets to achieve agency goals and objectives

TargetResult.Description: % of end of year state, earmarked, and restricted funds cash balance committed or obligated to future projects

td.div:
Performance Plan/Report Form
Sharing organizational goals, objectives, and performance indicators

p.div: This form provides an easy way to convert strategic plans into performance plans and reports by documenting stakeholder roles and performance indicators for each objective. Click the XML button at the bottom of the form and then save the file on your hard drive in plain XML format. Click the XML+XSL button to save it in a more attractive presentation format but you will also need to download and place the stylesheet in the same directory. When you have saved the file, you can either reimport it into this form for further editing or use any other XML editor. When you're ready to share it with others, post it on the Web. If you'd like to have it indexed in the StratML collection, send the URL to Owen Ambur.
